Package fr.ubx.poo.model.go.character.automovablepolicies

Class Automovable

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.ubx.poo.model.go.character.automovablepolicies.Automovable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BehindPlayerPolicy, InFrontOfPlayerPolicy, OnPlayerPolicy, RandomPolicy
    public abstract class Automovable
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class is used to implement a moving policy for the monsters

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected boolean canMove​(Direction direction)  
      Direction computeMove()
      Compute a move according to the policies for a monster.
      protected Monster getMonsterToMove()  
      static Automovable getRandomPolicy​(Monster monsterToMove, Game game)
      This function is used to get a random moving policy for the monsters
      static int getSpeed​(int level)  
      abstract AutomovableType getType()
      This function is used to know the type of policy which is implemented by using the enum type AutomovableType, for instance to make some differents treatments by the view
      abstract java.util.List<Direction> sortDirections​(java.util.List<Direction> directions)
      This function is used on the function computeMove to know in which order a List of Direction will be considered to make a move (the first position possible in this sort will be do)

    • Method Detail

      • canMove

        protected boolean canMove​(Direction direction)

      • getMonsterToMove

        protected Monster getMonsterToMove()

      • getSpeed

        public static int getSpeed​(int level)
        Parameters:
        level - the level in which the player is
        Returns:
        a random speed (in seconds) of monster

      • getRandomPolicy

        public static Automovable getRandomPolicy​(Monster monsterToMove,
                                          Game game)
        This function is used to get a random moving policy for the monsters
        Parameters:
        monsterToMove - the monster that we want to move
        game - the game in which the monster is playing
        Returns:
        a random policy among the existing implemented policies

      • sortDirections

        public abstract java.util.List<Direction> sortDirections​(java.util.List<Direction> directions)
        This function is used on the function computeMove to know in which order a List of Direction will be considered to make a move (the first position possible in this sort will be do)
        Parameters:
        directions - the List of directions that we have to sort.
        Returns:
        a list of direction which will be sorted

      • computeMove

        public Direction computeMove()
        Compute a move according to the policies for a monster. The only thing needed to make a new policy is to overload the function sortDirections.
        Returns:
        the direction in which a monster has to go

      • getType

        public abstract AutomovableType getType()
        This function is used to know the type of policy which is implemented by using the enum type AutomovableType, for instance to make some differents treatments by the view
        Returns:
        the type corresponding to the policy
